descriptionHtml:
It is Japanese. English can not.

Please do not you think, but care about the strange place is often because it is translated in machine translation.
Vanilla is not a muscular voice, it is the data to be modified to young voice.
This is my voice.

We added a shout version.
Please introduce your choice here.

----sample----
[youtube]nr1rGYo_WVo[/youtube]

To use set1 is required "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215/]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim.[/url]"
And there remain some vanilla, but please come and use those who are playing at a young character.

[Introduction method]
・ SET1 folder
Please be as it is overwritten to SET1 folder of MOD "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215/?]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim.[/url]"
Then, words are reproduced according to the situation by performing settings in the description as the "Additional Player Voices for Skyrim" in the game.
・ Sound folder
■ If the normal installation
Please copy the folder to the default steamapps / common / skyrim / in data.
It also corresponds to the non-human race by renaming the maleeventoned in the folder.
■ In the case of MO
Please copy to overwrite folder.
author: Yukiya
